ugboro ugboro: Ọnụọgụ okirikiri ebili mmiri na-agafe otu isi n'ime oge enyere
ogologo ife efe: Anya n'etiti isi ihe abụọ kwekọrọ na ebili mmiri
njup\u1ee5ta: Ntugharị kachasị nke isi ihe site na nha nha ya na ebili mmiri
\u00ech\u00e8: Ụdị ike nke na-ejegharị dị ka ebili mmiri
\u1ee5d\u1ecb d\u1ecb iche iche nke elec: Ogo nke frequency eletrọmagnetic niile enwere ike
voltaji: Ọdịiche enwere ike n'etiti isi ihe abụọ na sekit
magnetism: Ike nke magnetik na-etinye na ụfọdụ ihe
electromagnet: Igwe ọkụ mebere site na ọkụ eletrik site na eriri igwe
electroscope: Ngwa na-achọpụta ọnụnọ yana akara nke ụgwọ eletrik
sekit: Ụzọ mechiri emechi na-enye ohere ọkụ eletrik na-eru
usoro: Sekit nwere ihe niile ejikọrọ n'otu akaghị
yiri: Sekit nwere akụrụngwa jikọtara n'ofe ọtụtụ alaka
iguzogide: Mmegide na-erugharị ọkụ eletrik na onye nduzi
iwu ohm: Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti voltaji, ugbu a, na nguzogide (V = IR)
oghere: Ihe na-atụgharị anya nke nwere ike ilekwasị anya ma ọ bụ gbanwee ụzarị ọkụ
mirror: Elu dị nro nke na-egosipụta ìhè
nt\u1ee5ghar\u1ecb uche: Na-ehulata ọkụ ka ọ na-esi n'otu ọkara na-agafe ọzọ
ngwa anya: Alaka nke physics na-amụ ọkụ na akụrụngwa ya
